```{r results = "asis",warning =F}
library(tidyverse)


origin_data <- read_lines('Origin_Engagement_text.txt')

origin_df <- origin_data %>% 
  as_data_frame(.) 


colnames(origin_df) <- c('terms')

br_data <- origin_df %>% 
  filter(str_detect(terms, "Origin")) %>%   
  filter(str_detect(terms, "ACCR")) %>% 
  distinct(.)

class(br_data)

write_csv(br_data, "blackrock.csv")

```
